explains: v. 庇护；窝藏；怀有；为……提供庇护；入港停泊；居住，生存
wordGroup: pearl harbor 珍珠港（美国夏威夷港口）
safe harbor 安全港；避风港
attack on pearl harbor 偷袭珍珠港

sentences.en: The Statue of Liberty towers stands above the harbor of New York.
sentences.cn: 自由女神像耸立在纽约港的上空。

sentences.en: Ships last a lot longer when they go to sea than when they stay in the harbor.
sentences.cn: 出海的船舶寿命要比留在港口里的船舶寿命长得多。

sentences.en: Though smaller than many other phocids, harbor seals are similar in size to most otariids.
sentences.cn: 虽然港海豹的体型较小，但其体型与大多数的 otariids（海狮和海狗）相似。
